title: so what am i suppose to do?
body:
The game suddenly de sync for no reason and it starts to slow down my internet, so i disconnect to reconnect again this shows up  
After 20 reattempt to reconnect i still get it, unless i play a new match, i tried everything that can come to your mind, this happened ever since pre season patch release. What am i suppose to do? this was on my series aswell , now excuse me while i get 5 or 15 or 30 min penalty queue

replies.body:
One of two things come to mind for me seeing this kind of error: either the match itself crashed (in which case you wouldn't have been able to try reconnecting since the match no longer existed at all), or your network couldn't get a signal with our servers from something possibly blocking it like a firewall/antivirus or simply a hiccup in your connection. 

Try switching to ethernet if possible, but I'd also try adjusting your DNS and juuuuust in case your port forwarding as well. You can find those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you aren't familiar with them already.
